problem.markdown:
>>In this class, will there be a focus on topics such as machining processes, specific equipment, or models of factory layout? << ( )Yes (x)No
[Explanation] We will not focus on the different physical elements of a factory but instead focus on the analysis of the factory as a system. [Explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: In this class, will there be a focus on topics such as machining processes, specific equipment, or models of factory layout?

div.p: We will not focus on the different physical elements of a factory but instead focus on the analysis of the factory as a system.
